data.name: RPG Maker MV - JDB: Classical Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Nothing beats that classic fantasy feeling found in many role playing games.

Created by JDB Artist, the musician behind the wildly popular Inspirational series, JDB: Classical Adventure includes music tracks, background sounds and short themes perfect for fanfares, victories and inns. Whether you're wanting to recreate that nostalgic feeling or want to spice up your game's soundtrack, JDB: Classical Adventure is the pack for you!

This pack contains:

  • 22 BGM tracks, with music for battles, dungeons, towns and more.
  • 14 thematic background sounds.
  • 13 ME tracks for victories, fanfares, defeats and more.
  • OGG, MP3 and M4A formats for use in RPG Maker MV.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

1 - Battle 1
2 - Battle 2
3 - Battle 3
4 - Boss 1
5 - Boss 2
6 - Boss 3
7 - Christmas- A Mysterium
8 - Dungeon 1
9 - Dungeon 2
10 - Dungeon 3
11 - Field 1
12 - Field 2
13 - Field 3
14 - Friendly Ghosts
15 - Frozen Deep in Ice
16 - Hall of Kings
17 - Inn 1
18 - Inn 2
19 - Suspicious Town
20 - The Abyss
21 - The Church
22 - The Promise

data.short_description: Created by JDB Artist, the musician behind the wildly popular Inspirational series, JDB: Classical Adventure includes music tracks, background sounds and short themes perfect for fanfares, victories and inns.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
